content: a versatile crochet net drawstring bag ideal for produce fruit and holding other items very stretchy and strong to hold a large volume and weight any 4ply or 5ply cotton yarn is suitable gauge is not important you will need approx 1/3 ball premier cotton flair yarn 4 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitches used us terminology chain stitch chain single_crochet single_crochet us = double_crochet double_crochet uk double_crochet double_crochet us = treble stitch treble_crochet uk slip_stitch sl
